comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Kohler Mesa = laying low? Yikes! I think not! Where did you Bertrams go, Annapurna? We looked down on you guys from time to time, but watching your progress up Flagstaff was painful. Like watching lichens ripen. "What the hell... are they going _backwards_?!!" "No, that's just time. Force yourself to look away before you age a sudden ten years." "I feel sorry for them. They look so... _glacial_." "At least they're patient. (God knows they have to be.)" DU

comments.author: jennifer
comments.body: I think the major storm is here. Campus closure, according to my text message alert anyway, and whiteout conditions in Boulder, according to my dentists' office who called to reschedule my appointment today. Confirmations, anyone?
